For International Womenâ€™s Day 2018, I was involved in a speaker series at BCG DV Berlin, with the goal of exchanging perspectives on leadership, collaboration, diversity, and transformation in our personal and professional lives.

No Guts No Glory

I wrote & led a discussion where I interviewed two inspirational women in my lives that covered a broad spectrum of topics with the audience, including how to face personal fears, navigating transitions and career planning. It was an absolute pleasure & a wonderful experience.
